data.name: Binds

data.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[EndSkill] Next turn, gain 20 [Binding], 1 [ForwardToTheKing], and 2 [Enhancement]
[EndSkill] Next turn, apply 20 [Binding] and 3 [Enhancement] to 2 other allies in the order of Deployment
- The number of affected allies grows by (highest Gloom or Pride Reson. - 2) (max 2)
data.name: Binds

passiveList.desc:
- Combat Start: At 4+ highest Reson. that includes this unit's Skills, apply 3 [AttackUp] and 3 [DefenseUp] to self and all allies who were a part of that Reson.
- If the said Reson. was an A-Reson., apply 2 additional [AttackUp] and [DefenseUp]
passiveList.name: Chains of Binding
